findTarget(int, Message) - Method in class ghost.Ambusher
Chase mode: Top right corner Scatter mode: Four grid spaces ahead of Waka (based on Waka’s current direction)
findTarget(int, Message) - Method in class ghost.Chaser
Chase mode: Waka’s position Scatter mode: Top left corner
findTarget(int, Message) - Method in class ghost.Ghosts
find the target according to the characteristic of the ghost
findTarget(int, Message) - Method in class ghost.Ignorant
Chase mode: If more than 8 units away from Waka (straight line distance) target location is Waka.
findTarget(int, Message) - Method in class ghost.Whim
Chase mode: Double the vector from Chaser to 2 grid spaces ahead of Waka.
